buy().details: Only one ticket may be purchased per address

params.protocolFee: The fee percentage (in basis points) that the protocol charges on sales
params.protocolFeeRecipient: The address that will receive the collected protocol fees
params.sale: A `SaleParams` struct containing the parameters of the sale
params.streamer: The address of the streamer responsible for the sale
params.ticketImplementation: The address of the ticket contract implementation to clone for this sale
params.ticketParams: A `TicketParams` struct containing the parameters for the tickets being created

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

refund(uint256).details: Upon refund, the ticket is burned

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

withdraw().details: Only withdraw funds after the end of the sales. Protocol fee is charged

buy().notice: Allows to buy tickets during the sales

initialize(address,address,uint256,addre.notice: Initializes a new sale instance with the provided parameters and creates a ticket contract

refund(uint256).notice: Allows to request a refund before the end of ticket sales

withdraw().notice: Allows withdrawal of funds collected from sales

documentation.text: @notice Checks that sales have started and not yet ended
@notice Checks to see if the sales is over
@notice Checks that sales have not started

@notice Allows to buy tickets during the sales
 @dev Only one ticket may be purchased per address

@notice Allows to request a refund before the end of ticket sales
 @dev Upon refund, the ticket is burned

@notice Allows withdrawal of funds collected from sales
 @dev Only withdraw funds after the end of the sales. Protocol fee is charged
